Brand Tags and Hash Tags

Make influencers inclue youe brands Instagram handle with their posts. This way audience members will have a clear path to visit your page. add required hashtags to drive prople help your posts be discovered by people searching for specific themts (ex. #feelinggood, #newyearnewyou)

Show this listing to VIP influencers?

(VIP creators cost 2 campaign credits)

VIP Influencers are our best of the best influencers. They have a combination of amazing content creation skills, avery engaged audience, and a sizeable following. You can always add more VIP influencers credits to your plan from the dashboard.
